title: What Would You Do?/Am I The A**hole(AITA): Removing "In Sickness & In Health" from Your Vows
itunes:title: What Would You Do?/Am I The A**hole(AITA): Removing "In Sickness & In Health" from Your Vows
description:
The Basic and the Brain continue their new segment called "What would you do/Am I the asshole?". This week we talk about a deleted reddit post where someone asks if they're the a**hole for wanting to remove the "In sickness & in health" portion of their vows. Since the post was deleted, we discuss scenarios if the poster were male versus female, what "in sickness and in health" means from our personal stories and whether we'd want our husbands to wipe our asses.


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
